mapper.select: SELECT NTITLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, NTITLE, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT NTITLE, REG_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE RECIEVER != 1 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT rnum, pid, btime, bdate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, PID, BTIME, bdate FROM (SELECT PID, BTIME, TO_CHAR(BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BDATE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODAY FROM BOOK_LIST WHERE BLN = #{bln} ORDER BY BTIME desc) WHERE BDATE = TODAY) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT DAY, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(BDATE,'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BDATE FROM BOOK_LIST WHERE BDATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND BDATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7 AND BLN = #{BLN} ) GROUP BY DAY,BDATE
mapper.insert: insert into CEO (CID, PW, CNAME, POST, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, EMAIL, BIRTHDAY, TEL, CIP, LOC_X, LOC_Y) values( #{cId}, #{cPass}, #{cName}, #{cPost}, #{cAddr1}, #{cAddr2}, #{cMail}, #{cBirth}, #{cPhone}, #{cIp}, #{loc_X}, #{loc_Y} )
mapper.select: select rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, bdate, btime, aprvl_yn, bseq from (select rownum rnum, r, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, bdate, btime, aprvl_yn, bseq from (select rownum as r, pname, tel, pet_name, case when pet_type ='c' then '고양이' when pet_type ='d' then '강아지' else '기타' end pet_type , bdate, btime, aprvl_yn, bseq from (select p.pname, p.tel, bl.pet_name, bl.pet_type, to_char(bl.bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as bdate, bl.btime, bl.aprvl_yn, to_char(bl.reg_date,'yyyy-mm_dd') as reg_date, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today, bseq from book_list bl, protector p where bl.pid = p.pid and bln = #{bln} order by bdate, btime, aprvl_yn desc) where bdate >= today order by r desc)) where r between #{startNum} and #{endNum} order by r asc

SELECT count(*) as totalNum FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(BL.BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BDATE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODAY, pname, tel FROM BOOK_LIST BL, PROTECTOR P WHERE BL.PID = P.PID AND BLN = #{bln} ) WHERE BDATE >= TODAY

SELECT CASE WHEN DAY='월' THEN 1 WHEN DAY='화' THEN 2 WHEN DAY='수' THEN 3 WHEN DAY='목' THEN 4 WHEN DAY='금' THEN 5 WHEN DAY='토' THEN 6 WHEN DAY='일' THEN 7 END AS DAY, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(QDATE,'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(QDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QDATE FROM QUESTION_GC WHERE QDATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND QDATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7 AND BLN =#{bln}) GROUP BY DAY, QDATE

select num, pname, tel, pet_name, case when pet_type ='c' then '고양이' when pet_type ='d' then '강아지' else '기타' end pet_type, bdate, bseq from (select rownum num, rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, bdate, bseq from (select rownum rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, bdate, bseq from (select pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, to_char(bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today, bl.bseq from book_list bl, protector p where bl.pid = p.pid and bln = #{bln} order by bdate desc) where bdate <= today order by rnum desc)) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum} order by num desc

select count(*) as cnt from (select to_char(bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today from book_list bl, protector p where bl.pid = p.pid and bln = #{bln} )
where bdate <= today

select rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, case when pet_type ='c' then '고양이' when pet_type ='d' then '강아지' else '기타' end pet_type, mdate, msg, mid from (select rownum as r, rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, mdate, msg, mid from (select rownum rnum, pname, tel, pet_name, pet_type, mdate, msg, mid from (select p.pname, p.tel, bl.pet_name, bl.pet_type, msg, mseq, to_char(mdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today, mid from MNTR m, book_List bl, PROTECTOR p where m.bseq = bl.bseq and bl.pid = p.pid and bl.bln = #{bln} order by mdate) where mdate <= today order by rnum desc)) where r between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select count(*) as cnt from (select p.pname, p.tel, bl.pet_name, bl.pet_type, msg, mseq, to_char(mdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today, mid from MNTR m, book_List bl, PROTECTOR p where m.bseq = bl.bseq and bl.pid = p.pid and bl.bln = #{bln} order by bdate) where mdate <= today

select rnum, pname, qtitle, case when qtype ='1' then '진료문의' when qtype ='2' then '날짜문의' when qtype='3' then '상품문의' else '기타' end qtype, qdate, rstatus, qgc_seq from (select rownum rnum, rnumber, pname, qtitle, qtype, qdate, rstatus, qgc_seq from (select rownum rnumber, pname, qtitle, qtype, qdate, rstatus, qgc_seq from (select p.pname, qg.qtitle, qg.qtype, to_char(qg.qdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') qdate, qg.rstatus ,qg.qgc_seq from QUESTION_GC qg, protector p where qg.pid = p.pid and bln = #{bln} order by qdate desc, rstatus)
order by rnumber desc) order by rnumber) where rnumber between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select count(*) from (select rownum r, rnum, pname, qtitle, qtype, qdate, rstatus, qgc_seq from (select rownum rnum, pname, qtitle, qtype, qdate, rstatus, qgc_seq from (select p.pname, qg.qtitle, qg.qtype, qg.qdate, qg.rstatus ,qg.qgc_seq from QUESTION_GC qg, protector p where qg.pid = p.pid and bln = #{bln} order by qdate) ))

select rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, to_char(qdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') qdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select rownum r, rnum, qtitle, case when qtype ='1' then '홈페이지' when qtype ='2' then '오류' when qtype='3' then '등록' else '기타' end qtype, wid, qdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, qdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select rownum rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, qdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select qtitle, qtype, wid, qdate, rstatus, qua_seq from QUESTION_UA order by qdate)) order by qdate desc)) where r between #{startNum} and #{endNum} and wid = #{cId} order by rnum desc

select count(*) cnt from (select rownum r, rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, rdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, rdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select rownum rnum, qtitle, qtype, wid, rdate, rstatus, qua_seq from (select qtitle, qtype, wid, rdate, rstatus, qua_seq from QUESTION_UA order by rdate)) order by rdate desc)) where wid = #{cId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLINIC ( BLN,CID,CLN_NAME,DIRECTOR,TEL,EMAIL, OPEN_TIME, CLOSE_TIME,POST,SIDO,SIGUNGU,EMD,X,Y,ADDR_DETAIL, SUBJECT,NIGHT_YN,INTRO,CUT_YN,HSTL_YN,CIP,APRVL_DATE ) VALUES (#{cBln},#{cId},#{hName},#{cName},#{cPhone},#{cMail}, rpad(#{openTime},5,0),rpad(#{endTime},5,0),#{cPost},'서울','관악구', '봉천동', #{loc_x},#{loc_y},#{cAddr2}, #{subject}, #{night}, #{intro}, #{beauty}, #{hosCare}, '127.0.0.1', sysdate)
insert into cln_img ( bln, path, reg_id, reg_ip ) values ( #{bln}, #{path}, #{reg_id}, #{reg_ip} )
insert into QUESTION_UA ( QUA_SEQ, QTITLE, QTEXT, WID, WTYPE, QDATE, QTYPE, WIP) values ( qua_seq, #{title}, #{text}, #{cId}, #{ceoCheck}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{qtype}, '127.0.0.1' )
mapper.select: select qtitle, qtext, wid, qdate, case when qtype ='1' then '홈페이지' when qtype ='2' then '오류' when qtype='3' then '등록' else '기타' end qtype, rdate, reply from QUESTION_UA where qua_seq = #{qua_seq}

select qtitle, qtext, pid, to_char(qdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') qdate, case when qtype ='1' then '진료문의' when qtype ='2' then '날짜문의' when qtype='3' then '상품문의' else '기타' end qtype, qgc_seq from QUESTION_GC where qgc_seq = #{qgc_seq}

select qtitle, qtext, pid, to_char(qdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') qdate, case when qtype ='1' then '진료문의' when qtype ='2' then '날짜문의' when qtype='3' then '상품문의' else '기타' end qtype, reply, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rid from QUESTION_GC where qgc_seq = #{qgc_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into mntr (MSEQ, BSEQ, MID, MIP, MDATE, MSG, bln) values (M_SEQ, #{bseq}, #{mid}, #{mip}, sysdate, #{reply}, #{bln} )
insert into mntr_img ( mseq, path ) values( #{mseq}, #{path} )
